Talkers.TalkerText: A baker, transporting his goods by hand cart, has an unlucky break- that being one of his cart's wheels. As his bread spills over the road, a nearby policeman stops traffic to assist him.
Talkers.Option1: Get out and help the baker.
Talkers.Option1outcome: You hop out of the truck and quickly help the baker rein in his wayward grains. The policeman notices you.
Talkers.Option2outcome: You shrink down in the car, attempting to make yourself unrecognizable.
Talkers.Option3outcome: You gun it, running over the baker's dozen or so loaves.

Talkers.TalkerText: A small orange and white cat runs into the road, followed closely by a young girl. The car has to swerve to a stop to avoid hitting her.
Talkers.Option3: Give her something to keep her off the road.
Talkers.Option1outcome: The girl scoops up the cat and runs off crying, noticed by a few passersby.
Talkers.Option2outcome: The cat and girl wander off the road and you continue onwards.
Talkers.Option3outcome: You toss her a dollar and tell her to get a candy from the market. She takes it, beaming, and hurries off, the cat following close behind her.

Talkers.TalkerText: A crowd of civilians cross the street. And cross. And cross... and they don't seem to be stopping anytime soon.
Talkers.Option1outcome: Startled, some of the passersby drop their bags. Some people...
Talkers.Option2outcome: You slowly inch forward into the stream of people and they flow around you like water. Within a couple seconds, you're on the other side of the strange deluge. How bizarre...
Talkers.Option3outcome: You floor the accelerator, tires squealing. You don't hit anyone, luckily, but people have to throw themselves out of the way. Somehow, a purse ends up snagged to the hood ornament.
